# William Wolff - Software Engineer & Technical Architect

> Portfolio and CV for William Wolff, a software engineer with 10+ years of experience in blockchain infrastructure, distributed systems, and product development.

## About

This is the personal portfolio and CV website for William Wolff, showcasing:

- **Professional Experience**: R&D Innovation Lead at Input Output Global (IOG) working on Ouroboros Leios high-throughput protocol for Cardano blockchain
- **Technical Expertise**: Blockchain infrastructure, distributed systems, event-driven architecture, smart contracts, cryptography
- **Projects**: Voice-first apps, NFT marketplaces, chain indexers, DEX integration libraries, stake pool operations
- **Open Source Contributions**: Dolos (chain indexer), Lucid (transaction library), Scrolls (multi-DEX indexing), DEX order serialization library

## Site Structure

- `/` - Home page with portfolio overview
- `/#cv` - Full curriculum vitae with detailed work history
- `/#projects-page` - Comprehensive project showcase

## Content

The site includes:
- Detailed work experience from 2015-present
- Technical projects across blockchain, mobile, and web development
- Technology stack: TypeScript, Rust, Swift, Kotlin, Python, Java, Haskell
- Focus areas: Cardano blockchain, eUTxO model, Plutus smart contracts, distributed systems

## Contact

Contact information available on request through the website.

## Languages

Content available in:
- English (default)
- German (Deutsch)
